text: Steve Harvey (born January 17, 1957) is an American stand-up comedian and game show host. He is currently the host on Family Feud. He also hosted his other program Steve Harvey's Big Time. He currently hosts the talk show Steve Harvey, which started on September 3, 2012. On December 18th, 2024 a rumor started that he died, but he's alive and well. ==References== Category:Living people Category:1957 births Category:African-American comedians Category:American game show hosts Category:American television talk show hosts Category:Actors from West Virginia Category:Comedians from West Virginia Category:Actors from Cleveland Category:Comedians from Cleveland
title: Steve Harvey
